channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Hide or Lock Apps With iOS 18 (2024)
item.description: Protect your apps from prying eyes with Apple’s latest security feature.

item.title: Oura has acquired metabolic health startup Veri
item.description: Blood sugar levels are foundational to the Veri platform. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Trump Fans Spread Debate Conspiracy About Microphone Earrings
item.description: After Donald Trump’s incoherent performance at the presidential debate, in which he shouted about people eating household pets, his fans fixated on Ka...

item.title: Fearless Fund is shutting down its contested Strivers Grant program
item.description: Fearless Fund has settled its case with the American Alliance for Equal Rights (AAER), agreeing to shut down its Strivers Grant program. © 2024 TechCr...

item.title: The Cost of Lightning
item.description: Exactly how climate change will impact lightning isn’t clear, but governments, public bodies, and the military are prepping for stormier weather.

item.title: Meet Verse, an AI-powered creative app that helps Gen Z design and publish expressive content
item.description: Verse, a new AI-powered creative app, is aiming to help Gen Z users create hyper-visual and expressive content. The iOS app allows users to design and...

item.title: Breadfruit Is Here to Save the World
item.description: This calorie-rich, nutrient-dense, and climate-resilient crop has the power to step in for more common staples that can’t handle global warming.

item.title: Adobe says video generation is coming to Firefly this year
item.description: Users will get their first chance to try out Adobe’s AI model for video generation in just a couple months. The company says features powered by Adobe...

item.title: The World’s Biggest Bitcoin Mine Is Rattling This Texas Oil Town
item.description: A cash-strapped city in rural Texas will soon be home to the world’s largest bitcoin mine. Local protesters are “raising hell.”

item.title: Connectly, now backed by Alibaba, taps AI to personalize text messages to customers
item.description: Stefanos Loukakos, formerly a director at Meta’s business-focused Messenger division and, briefly, the tech giant’s blockchain org, noticed several ye...
